C

Caesar - Class in com.security
This is the Caesar class modified for the 3.0 version of the program.
Caesar() - Constructor for class com.security.Caesar
Default constructor of the Caesar class.
CaesarFrame - Class in com.primary
This is the main frame for the Caesar Cipher program.
CaesarFrame() - Constructor for class com.primary.CaesarFrame
Creates new form CaesarFrame Also: Initialize the components Center the frame in the screen Evaluates for the first time the message Evaluates for the first time the key Establishes the listeners for every component in the GUI Set the Caesar Cipher icon for the form
checkAlphabet(String) - Method in class com.primary.Start
Check the alphabet contained in the txtAlphabet text field.
chooserAlphabet - Variable in class com.primary.Start
Chooser used to load a file with the Alphabet for the Caesar Cipher program
cipher(String, int) - Static method in class com.security.Caesar
Method used by the class to cipher the message using the whole alphabet.
com.primary - package com.primary
Provides the classes necesary to establish the GUI for the Caesar Cipher program.
com.security - package com.security
Provides the classes necesary to the back-end functionality of Caesar Cipher program.
com.util - package com.util
Provides the class RepeatedCharacters which is used to detect if a character is repeated when the alphabet is loaded to the Caesar class.
